column3: This assertion in the definition seems unneeded? IIUC the lock annotation in the function declaration enforces it.
Why use the `::cs_main` global reference here rather than `cs_main`?
I think for new code we prefer `::global`, unless the name of the global is prefixed with `g_...`, in which case `::g_...` and `g_...` are allowed.
Never mind, just saw the developer notes recommend this ("Combine annotations in function declarations with\n  run-time asserts in function definitions").
